Computational Model Builder¶

Version: 2019

ModelBuilder is an application built on SMTK to provide engineers and scientists with a customizable work-flow for the entire lifetime of a computational simulation. ModelBuilder leverages several powerful open-source tools and integrates them into an application framework that can be easily adapted to specific problem domains.
